overview: Borrowing its plot and title from the Jennifer Aniston-Jay Mohr vehicle Picture Perfect, this romantic Bollywood comedy finds a single working girl named Pooja (Kirti Reddy) trying to convince her curmudgeonly boss (Kader Khan) that she's engaged to a prominent artist (Abhishek Bachchan). The only trouble is, she's actually in love with her boss's son, Raj (Sanjay Suri) -- but, thanks to her lies, he thinks she's off-limits.
title: Picture Perfect
